Name: Jakson
description:
Jakson is 37 years old and lives with his wife and two children in the community of Mojaras, Huicungo, San Mart√≠n, where he grows cocoa and raises cattle.

He has worked with Norandino for three years, during which he has been responsible and met his payment commitments. He will use this loan to buy compost for growing cocoa and to pay day labourers to harvest it.

He thanks Kiva for the support.
